description: Strike awards the particular player a card
Spare awards the particular player a card
Minimum 1 card in hand to Minimum 5 cards in hand with interchangeable cards from onwards on a strike (new card before accepting would be visible to the user)
Minimum 1 card in hand to maximum 24 cards in hands
Joker (Wild Card) would be changed automatically to the card considering what client would need to make the winning pairs
If a split happens and 2 hands altogether make a spare, Than the spare rule would be implemented.
The moderator will have the ability to award any card to the any of the player
The Moderator will have the ability to play the game of any user if he/she has any malfunctions on the phone or unable to use the phone.
